name: berry-juice
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 20 HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.
